MULTIPLE_START_EVENTS.message: Multiple start nodes are not allowed.

MULTIPLE_END_EVENTS.message: Multiple end nodes are not allowed.

START_EVENT_OUTPUT_MISSING.message: A start node should have at least 1 output.

END_EVENT_INPUT_MISSING.message: An end node should have at least 1 input.

JOINT_OP_MULTIPLE_OUTPUTS.message: Each joint operator can only have 1 output.
